meanings.definition: A synthetic antibacterial compound used in the treatment of various infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed sulfadiazine to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: Sulfadiazine is commonly used to treat skin infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the mighty sulfadiazine.
meanings.sent4: Her healing powers were like sulfadiazine, wiping out all negativity.
meanings.sent5: The sulfadiazine worked like a superhero, defeating the evil bacteria.

meanings.definition: A medication that belongs to the class of sulfonamides.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained the benefits of sulfadiazine to the patient.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe sulfadiazine for certain bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The sulfadiazine in the bottle winked at the other medications.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge was a powerful tool, just like sulfadiazine in medicine.
meanings.sent5: The sulfadiazine sparkled on the shelf, promising healing to those in need.
